name: Metacell
blurb: A 2D twitch puzzle shooter with a retro feel and a hard sci-fi plot. Can you defeat the Metacell and save the universe from destruction

rewards.reward: [I\u2019ve Got Five On It]\r\nClosed-Beta access and a high five! Our high fives are pretty legendary, you know. I once heard that Chris\u2019s high fives severed a man\u2019s arm.
[Metacell Digital Soundtrack] Only interested in awesome space metal music? You\u2019ll get a digital copy of the Metacell soundtrack. Time to rock out!
[Metacell Digital Edition] You will get Closed-Beta access and the basic digital copy of \r\nthe game upon release. This provides instant satisfaction as well as a future gift. Smart thinking!

[Metacell Kickstarter Edition - Digital] You will get Closed-Beta access to the game, a digital copy of the game, and a digital copy of the soundtrack upon release. The super cool thing about this version of the game is that it comes with a unique Kickstarter exclusive game mode which will change the way you see Metacell FOREVER, you lucky thing.

[All I Got Was This Awesome Shirt] Pfff...who cares about epic space metal, a rad video game, or a super spectacular saga? Just give me one of these badass t-shirts. You get to pick from 1 of the 4 exclusive t-shirt designs that will never ever be made again outside of this Kickstarter campaign [Products for Robots, Space Vikings, Metacell, or The Imaginary Awesome Studio]. If you live not in the United States of Awesome, tack on an additional $15 so we can ship you your schwag. ***Scroll down to the bottom of this page to see the shirt designs!***

[Metacell Members Club - Basic] You will get Closed-Beta access of Metacell 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 and digital copies when they are ready for release 7 days before anyone else. This is a Kickstarter-only opportunity and is only available during the campaign.
[Doodle Me Chris] You like the doodle style of the PfR staff? Well guess what? Chris will doodle you (hehehe doodle). If you live anywhere outside of 'MRIKA HELL YEAH! Tag on that 15$ for shipping.

[Metacell Kickstarter Edition - Physical] You get Closed-Beta access and a digital copy of both the game and the soundtrack. You also get a physical copy of the game, soundtrack, and game manual in a box just like the good ol\u2019 days. You will also have your pick of 1 of 4 exclusive t-shirt designs that will never ever be made again outside of this Kickstarter campaign [Products for Robots, Space Vikings, Metacell, or The Imaginary Awesome Studio]. Your version of the game will include the EXCLUSIVE Kickstarter game mode. This is a Kickstarter-only opportunity and is only available during the campaign. Oh, did we mention the physical edition is signed by the team? Yeah, now we did. Sorry non-US of Awesome residents, but you got to add an additional $15 for international shipping. ***Scroll down to the bottom of the page to check out the designs!***

[Metacell Fanboy Club - Ultimate] Kickstarter exclusive, you will get Closed-Beta access and super nifty physical editions of Metacell 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 upon their completion. In these fantastic collector\u2019s editions, you will find a hard copy of the game, the soundtrack, the game manual, and 3 additional keys that you can give to your friends, sell on ebay, or make 3 different accounts to troll people with. You will also gain early access to the game 7 days before its general release. You will also also receive A SPECTACULAR BONUS GIFT OF YOUR CHOICE! You will get an e-mail a few months before release asking you to pick 1 of 4 super cool gifts to go in your collector's edition.\r\n\r\n**Please See Full Description to the Left by Scrolling Down to "the Hows" Section.**

[PfR VIP Club Member] A Kickstarter exclusive, you will get 4 digital copies and 1 physical VIP edition of everything PfR makes from now until the end of time! This also comes with free VIP access to any PfR event (including Space Viking shows).

[I\u2019ve Got 5,000 On It] You get the best high five ever. Like, imagine if Jesus came down from heaven to give you a high five; it\u2019s exactly like that. Oh, and pretty much all of the lesser pledges.
[Hehehe BOOBIE] You get a picture of an amazing rack. Worth every penny.

[THIS PLEDGE REWARD IS OVER 9,000!] You get to be a special guest in the next Imaginary Awesome Studio animated short. John will make you into a puppet, Chris will animate you, and Caitlin will make you say really clever things. How cool is that? Super cool, that\u2019s how cool.

[Fanboy's Wet Dream] You get to become a main character in the Metacell Saga. John will design you, Chris will draw you, Tom will program you, and the world will play you. Neat, huh? Time to give Mario a run for his money as the best game character ever.
